name: Mario: Horror
description:
so, why did you do it, why did you eat the spaghetti.

you knew it wasn't yours, but you did it anyway.

this is all on you.

the map was made using modular sci-fi on the asset store or something because I'm lazy

uberduck for voices
pretty much everything else was by me

this game is not complete in the slightest and I intend to keep working (because it's fun), if you encounter any issues tell me in the comments so I can fix them
